name: iPhone 13/11/X/SE & iPad Pro/mini - Apple Mockups/Artworks (Community)
description:

I always had problems on fitting my screens inside iPhone and iPad artworks, so i translated the officials psd and used Figma components feature to make this happening as easy and fast as possible.

Just paste or move your graphic inside the component at the left of the Apple Official Mockup!

Don't hesitate and let me know of any feedback!
